column3:
Sarah is a girl. Sarah has one brother. Sarah's brother's name is Timothy. Sarah has one
ewlinesister. Sarah's sister's name is Annabelle. Their last name is MacGregor. One day Sarah
ewlinewent to the park with her brother Timothy. They swung on the swings for a short time. Then
ewlineAnnabelle came out and swung with them. They all sang some nice songs together. They all
ewlinebecame very  happy. Then Timothy's friend came. Timothy liked his friend very
ewlinemuch. Timothy went off the swing and went away with his friend. Then Annabelle and Sarah
ewlinefelt very very sad. Happily then Annabelle and Sarah's friend came. Their friend's name was
ewlineKate Smith. She was the same age as Sarah. They wanted to go to the slide together. So
ewlinethey went to the slide and played for a long time. Then Annabelle became happy. And Sarah
ewlinealso became happy. Then they went home together and had some food.
